attributes.action: instruct the BBC to not allow Jacqui Oatley to commentate on any further football matches broadcast on TV
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to instruct the BBC to prevent Jacqui Oatley from commentating on any further football matches broadcast on TV.  

Oatley became the first female football commentator in the history of BBC football programme Match of the Day, with her debut broadcast on 21 April 2007 for the Premier League match between Fulham F.C. and Blackburn Rovers F.C.

We believe that this should not have been allowed to happen and we petition the Prime Minister to take immediate action and instruct the BBC to remove Jacqui Oatley from her position as football commentator.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
